flow.descriptionCdata:
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.09559c28-1caa-4c7c-89fe-99a6c3858dce.transition.description=Remote host ${host} did not respond to ping. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.1f23db89-b662-466c-b019-a8181d3847ce.transition.description=Health report created\: ${email} 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.20d7ee72-6cf4-4d53-8770-03275d5bce96.prompt=Enter a value for targetHost 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.2e6081ab-1d9a-4bef-9f45-1fb0213b1eb2.description=Checking number of processes, threads, and their statuses. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.34e51e63-4ae6-4349-9561-881ac846a68e.prompt=Notification Option\: 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.35d75f8e-5298-4319-bc28-ef3405d00cf5.transition.description=${host} successfully pinged. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.41386d66-effb-432c-872d-a9ac48f08a17.transition.description=${host} has ${ic_numProcs} processors. They were all online. Their loads were\: ${ic_load}%. They had ${ic_blockedThreads} threads waiting to use the CPU. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.47b67b70-60b3-4767-8c21-cadf483f41c4.transition.description=Failed to get uptime. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.4b4b506f-a875-4f94-9c8d-0d1bbc39934d.transition.description=failed to retrieve host name from ${host}. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.4c570d19-b391-4030-af13-a032bac5077f.description=
Runs a WMI query and formats the results.

Inputs\:
wql query - the query to run.
namespace - the wmi namespace to run the query in.
host - the host to run the query against.
user - a user to authenticate with host as.
password - the password for user.
format - How to format the query's results (text or csv).

Responses\:
success - the operation succeeded.
failure - an error occurred.
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.531212f6-8421-464c-b6f1-d316256afd11.description=
Allows a user to select how they should be notified of the outcome of a flow, and shows them a message in that way.

Inputs\:
notifyData -  The message to notify the user of.
notifyMethod - The method of notification (Write to File, Email, Display or None).
subject - This is a description of what the notification is about.
destination - For files, the file to write to, for emails the email to send to.
notificationServer - If the specified method send the notifydata to a server, this is the name of the server to notify (i.e. an email server)
from - This is the originator of the message (email from address).
sourceServer - Some integrations use a multi-level server architecture for processing tickets, this is the name of a mid-tier server in such an architecture.
serverPort - The port the service to notify on the server is running on.
username - A username to use when authenticating to a notification method requiring authentication.
password - The password for username.

Responses\:
success - The user was notified.
failure - Notification failed.

Note\: While scheduling flows that use Notify, the value for input variable "notifyMethod", along with values for other inputs as required by the Notify flow, must be entered in the scheduled flow using the "Add Input" option. This must be done even if "notifyMethod" is not a required input for the scheduled flow, as it will not be able to execute to completion without these inputs.

For example, if "notifyMethod" is given a value of "File", then the input for "destination" must also be given.
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.56de06a1-5b69-4836-aeff-2d761a8ad51a.description=
Queries how long it has been since the target computer was rebooted.
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.570dbc61-8ea0-4454-a26a-1ce7975ec279.transition.description=${host} has ${ic_freeMemory} kilobytes of free memory. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.612fc84d-3f0b-4a25-8494-e708b4d39ab7.transition.description=unable to query devices. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.65986b76-eb33-48fc-9046-9a674f2adabd.transition.description=Unable to send health report. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.6b01b31c-c4cb-4329-ae5b-3981ea77aa72.transition.description=failed to retrieve processor status. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.735ccb9a-f73b-45e8-b625-608945dfd713.description=

7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.9bb5e5aa-e5e4-4489-95dd-4f302d3dee4d.prompt=enter host 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.9e035777-bdcf-4a59-867b-b15d2ccb883c.transition.description=Unable to check physical memory on ${host}. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.a0016fbd-5d5e-4711-bfe6-b4440e922bd5.transition.description=unable to obtain process list. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.a0984617-9093-4471-9a3a-cdf7e1d5f4a0.transition.description=${host} has the following processes running\: ${ic_processList}. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.a3db0ca4-61ab-459c-ba31-929661d1eb95.transition.description=network could not be queried for errors. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.abcee612-783e-427d-8dce-d4c70b955a33.transition.description=${host} believes its name to be ${ic_OS} 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.c1fda1aa-bd9e-4f7b-a2e0-1d9673692358.transition.description=File system information retrieved\: ${ic_filesystem} 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.c5cdc84e-c61f-47ce-a28a-47a821645330.prompt=Enter a value for notifyData 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.c7568edd-264b-426d-abd7-2e477bd99db7.description=
Runs a WMI query and formats the results.

Inputs\:
wql query - the query to run.
namespace - the wmi namespace to run the query in.
host - the host to run the query against.
user - a user to authenticate with host as.
password - the password for user.
format - How to format the query's results (text or csv).

Responses\:
success - the operation succeeded.
failure - an error occurred.
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.c94b6359-d1ae-4a47-a4f1-cae6b7c4a1c7.transition.description=${host} has been running for ${ic_uptime} seconds. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.cc70432b-a403-4121-84f1-121605a40fb9.description=
Runs the Ping command locally. 

Input Parameters\:
targetHost - target host to ping
packetSize - size of the ping packet
packetCount - number of packets to send

Responses\:
success - the command was executed successfully
failure - the command could not be executed

Returns\:
packetsSent - the number of packets sent
packetsReceived - the number of packets received
percentagePacketsLost - the percentage of packets lost
transmissionTimeMin - minimum time taken for transmitting the packet
transmissionTimeMax - maximum time taken for transmitting the packet
transmissionTimeAvg - average time taken for transmitting the packet
returnResult - the raw output of the command
returnCode - return code from the executed command
error - the STDERR of the command
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.d06e2e0c-dbb5-4f5d-8bd8-047c66b5c52e.description=Creating health report. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.description=
This flow checks the overall health of a Windows server. It checks for many common problems, such as testing if the server is running, how much free memory the server has, and what percentage of its CPU is currently being utilized. A summary of the server's health is then either sent as email, displayed on the screen, written to a file or ignored.

NOTE\:
Only Windows XP, Windows 2003 and later versions track system uptime. Previous systems will always fail to obtain system uptime.

Inputs\:
host - The server to check the health of.
user - The username to use when authenticating with the host. Not required for localhost.
password - The password to use when authenticating with the host. Not required for localhost.
notifyMethod - How to notify the user the out come of the health check.
vitalProcesses - A list of comma separated values giving the name of the processes that are vital for Windows and should be running. Currently, this value is set to\: 				                      svchost.exe,lsass.exe,smss.exe,System,explorer.exe,services.exe,winlogon.exe
	     New processes can be added or existing ones can be removed from the list.	
packetCount - The number of ping packets to send.
packetSize - The size of the ping packet.

Responses\:
success - Health check prepared.
failure - Something went wrong.
7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.e1134929-8a26-460f-ae9b-cff5fb095488.transition.description=${successMessage} 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.ea19f3a5-b186-4aea-b237-2f2acc283c56.transition.description=${host} has ${ic_numProcs} processors. They were not all online. Their loads were\: ${ic_load}. They had ${ic_blockedThreads} threads waiting to use the CPU. 7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.ea58e87d-72e9-4508-ba28-3915659e7214.description=
Runs a WMI query and formats the results.

Inputs\:

Responses\:

7724a0b6-34bb-454a-969c-525b990d3952.ff205cfe-62f6-4fe8-87e0-2ec12ccd0eb9.transition.description=File system info could not be retrieved.
flow.name: Windows Health Check

scriptlet.name: Step Ping Target System in Flow Windows Health Check (698fc218-a5ce-43b6-881c-4e2a70ffb5ee)
Step Get FileSystem Information in Flow Windows Health Check (0cb0016a-6103-4ba9-982a-a48703d02786)

staticBinding.value: Select Name, FreeSpace, Size from Win32_LogicalDisk

scriptlet.name: Step Error : failure in Flow Windows Health Check (291b2aee-02c9-40a3-a036-1dd3e55d52cd)
Step Get Network Interface Errors in Flow Windows Health Check (2c1eca5e-f527-4238-b308-d2d6978fd551)

staticBinding.value: Select Name, ConfigManagerErrorCode from Win32_NetworkAdapter where ConfigManagerErrorCode > 0

scriptlet.name: Step Free Physical Memory in Flow Windows Health Check (1565b333-9aac-4bff-b20c-f1cf914a0606)
Step Get Processor Count/Status in Flow Windows Health Check (bf7d8094-0939-4518-812c-fc250d324ae2)
Step Notify in Flow Windows Health Check (b2ada0e3-0f87-4c74-a728-335bf2fcf42d)

staticBinding.value: Windows System Health Check results for ${host}

scriptlet.name: Step Get System Uptime in Flow Windows Health Check (5e869e11-e056-4e17-89a5-435477aa19c2)
Step Resolved : success in Flow Windows Health Check (096d1a75-3372-4659-91cd-8b99657024d1)
Step Get Running Process List in Flow Windows Health Check (97fafbfe-e7b5-4dfe-ad02-1625576b2e7d)
Step Get Host Name in Flow Windows Health Check (095b7754-07ef-4fa8-92a9-0ff73d95ec1d)
Step Check for Malfunctioning Devices in Flow Windows Health Check (95642f33-59bf-4694-b8d1-a5ed0a3f12d7)

staticBinding.value: Select * from Win32_PnPEntity where Status = 'Error' OR Status = 'Pred Fail' OR Status = 'Stressed ' OR Status = 'NonRecover'
